com.crawljax.browser

Interface EmbeddedBrowser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WebDriverBackedEmbeddedBrowser

    public interface EmbeddedBrowser
    Browser interface used by Crawjax.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Browser types.

    • Method Detail

      • goToUrl

        void goToUrl(URL url)
        Opens the url in the browser.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL.

      • fireEventAndWait

        boolean fireEventAndWait(Eventable event)
                         throws org.openqa.selenium.ElementNotVisibleException,
                                InterruptedException
        fires the event.
        Parameters:
        event - the event.
        Returns:
        if fails.
        Throws:
        org.openqa.selenium.ElementNotVisibleException
        InterruptedException

      • getDom

        String getDom()
        Returns:
        the DOM string with all the iframe content.

      • getDomWithoutIframeContent

        String getDomWithoutIframeContent()
        Returns:
        the DOM string WITHOUT the iframe content.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the browser.

      • closeOtherWindows

        void closeOtherWindows()
        Closes all other windows.

      • goBack

        void goBack()
        Go back to the previous state.

      • input

        boolean input(Identification identification,
            String text)
              throws CrawljaxException
        Parameters:
        identification - the identification.
        text - the text.
        Returns:
        true if succeeded.
        Throws:
        CrawljaxException - if fails.

      • executeJavaScript

        Object executeJavaScript(String script)
                         throws CrawljaxException
        Execute JavaScript in the browser.
        Parameters:
        script - The script to execute.
        Returns:
        The JavaScript return object.
        Throws:
        CrawljaxException - On error.

      • isVisible

        boolean isVisible(Identification identification)
        Checks if an element is visible.
        Parameters:
        identification - identification to use.
        Returns:
        true if the element is visible.

      • getCurrentUrl

        String getCurrentUrl()
        Returns:
        The current browser url.

      • getInputWithRandomValue

        FormInput getInputWithRandomValue(FormInput inputForm)
        Parameters:
        inputForm - the input form.
        Returns:
        a FormInput filled with random data.

      • getFrameDom

        String getFrameDom(String iframeIdentification)
        Parameters:
        iframeIdentification - the iframe's name or id.
        Returns:
        the DOM string of the corresponding iframe.

      • elementExists

        boolean elementExists(Identification identification)
        Parameters:
        identification - the identification of the element to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the element can be found in the browser's DOM tree.

      • getWebElement

        org.openqa.selenium.WebElement getWebElement(Identification identification)
        Parameters:
        identification - the identification of the element to be found.
        Returns:
        the corresponding WebElement from the browser.

      • saveScreenShot

        void saveScreenShot(File file)
                    throws CrawljaxException
        Parameters:
        file - the file to write the screenshot to (png).
        Throws:
        CrawljaxException - if saving screenshots is not supported by the implementing class.

      • getScreenShot

        byte[] getScreenShot()
                     throws CrawljaxException
        Returns:
        The screenshot in PNG format.
        Throws:
        CrawljaxException - if saving screenshots is not supported by the implementing class.

      • updateConfiguration

        void updateConfiguration(CrawljaxConfiguration configuration)
        Update the configuration of the Browser. When this method is called the implementing EmbeddedBrowser must updates its internal configuration to the values given as argument.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the new configuration values that needs to be updated.
